required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Lenalidomide Observational Study in Patients With Mantle Lymphoma in Relapse/Refraction. Spanish Programme RRMCL Results.
clinical_study.official_title: Lenalidomide Observational Study in Patients With Mantle Lymphoma in Relapse/Refraction. Spanish Programme RRMCL Results.

lead_sponsor.agency: Fundación Pública Andaluza para la gestión de la Investigación en Sevilla

clinical_study.source: Fundación Pública Andaluza para la gestión de la Investigación en Sevilla

brief_summary.textblock:
This is a multicentric, observational and retrospective study of the use of lenalidomide in patients with relapsed or refractory mantle cell lymphoma that are included in the RRMCL spanish program.
The lenalidomide effectiveness and tolerability data will be retrospectely collected until the 30 of April 2018.

primary_outcome.measure: Experience of real clinal practice lenalidomide use.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Start of observation period (first medical record available on site) up to last medical record available on site or the end of the observation period (31 December 2019), whichever occurred first
primary_outcome.description: Results of the the usage in real clinical practice of the lenalidomide monotherapy or combination treatment in patients with relapsed or refractory mantle cell lymphoma that aren´t candidate to other alternative treatments inside the RRMCL spanish program.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients that achieve objective response.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Start of observation period (first medical record available on site) up to last medical record available on site or the end of the observation period (31 December 2019), whichever occurred first
secondary_outcome.description: The objective response will be measured in terms of complete response, not confirmed complete response and partial response according to the 2007 International Working Group criteria after the 6º treatment cycle.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Start of observation period (first medical record available on site) up to last medical record available on site or the end of the observation period (31 December 2019), whichever occurred first
Start of observation period (first medical record available on site) up to last medical record available on site or the end of the observation period (31 December 2019), whichever occurred first
secondary_outcome.description: The disease free survival is defined as the time that passes from the inclusion in the record until a control is done or takes place a relapse (local or distant).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Start of observation period (first medical record available on site) up to last medical record available on site or the end of the observation period (31 December 2019), whichever occurred first
secondary_outcome.description: The disease overall survival is defined as the time that passes from the inclusion in the record until a control is done or the patient´s death.

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the incidence of treatment adverse events.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Start of observation period (first medical record available on site) up to last medical record available on site or the end of the observation period (31 December 2019), whichever occurred first
secondary_outcome.description: Number and description of adverse effects due to the lenalidomide treatment.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Mantle cell lymphoma treated with lenalidomide cohort
arm_group.description: Patients diagnosed with mantle cell lymphoma treated with leanalidomide through the RRMCL spanish program.

intervention.description: Lenalidomide effectiveness and tolerability data analysis, that will be retrospectively collected until the 30 of April 2018.
intervention.arm_group_label: Mantle cell lymphoma treated with lenalidomide cohort

study_pop.textblock: Adult patients diagnosed with mantle cell lymphoma that received lenalidomide through the RRMCL program as long as they meet all the inclusion criteria and none of the exclusion and independently from being dead or alive in the moment of data record.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- ≥ 18 years old.
- Diagnosed with relapsed or refractory mantle cell lymphoma verified by a tissue biopsy.
- Treated with monotherapy or combination of lenalidomide.
- Not candidate for any of the therapeutic options approved until that date for this disease.
- Not candidate or unable to be included in any clinical trial due to availability or geographical difficulty.
- Registered in the RRMCL spanish program.
Exclusion Criteria:
- ECOG > 2.
- Patients with uncontrolled comorbidities.
- Blastoid variant.
- Central nervous system tumor infiltration.
- HIV, HBV and/or HCV active infection.
- Radiotherapy concomitant treatment or that have received radiotherapy in the previous 30 days to the beginning of the first cycle of lenalidomide.
- Diagnosed with other active solid tumor except for basal cell carcinoma skin cancer.
- Patients that haven´t completed at least one complete cycle of the treatment.
